page.title: 10INDUSTRY
page.content: The only local industy is a firm who make gear boxes.It is ownd by a man called Mr.Sparks.Mr.Sparks does very well and he deals with 50 to 60 gear boxes a week. Mr.Sparks essembles the gear boxes for any type of car and he gets his parts for the gears from all over the world. Most of Mr.Sparks customers are local but he does deal with a number of foreign business too.Mr.Sparks has not much competition and the business being going for over eight years and he lives on a farm and twelve people work for him.
